inscription: LL margin: 昭和五年夏作 {Shōwa gonen natsu saku} (made in Summer 1930)
life_date: Kawase Hasui, Japanese, 1883–1957; Watanabe Shōzaburō, Publisher, Japanese, 1885–1962
markings: LLC, red round artist's seal: 川セ {Kawase}; LR margin, publisher seal D: 版権所有　渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright Watanabe Shōzaburō)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
text: Completed in 1252, the Great Buddha of the Kōtoku-in in Kamakura is a 13.35 meters (43.8 ft) high hollow bronze statue that can also be viewn from the inside.
title: The Great Buddha at Kamakura
